messages.message: Can we enable correct orientation in the OCR settings by default?
@Siddhant Can you enable this quickly before the build? Aayush and Subash are tied up with some UI fixes
I am AFK @Hari . When is the next build?
@Gaurav Saini in case you are around? I can pick this in next 2 hours
Yeah, i can raise a PR.
Raised the PR - https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/41595, but doens't look like CI would complete before the cut.

Not merging this change in for now. We actually need to set `correct_orientation_coarse` instead of `correct_orientation` . Also, this would make the number of ocr calls 4x. Do we want to add it? @Rakesh @Hari
Lets do some quick benchmarking on the cost of this -as this will run on all documents. @Gaurav Saini
@Rakesh we know the cost. For every page instead of 1 we make 4 ocr calls.

In the current approach - this will put a lot of load on OCR calls for enabling this by default - we will assess full latency and performance impact before we can enable this for AIHub.
Created a feedback ticket to track this.
https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/DR-2003
